attributes.action: explain to the taxpayer in a public statement at the Despatch Box why not one single MP - and therefore the cost of running our broken political system is not being reduced at the same time - has been made redundant during the current economic downturn while thousands of taxpaying voters have been made redundant.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Anybody who needs further elucidation of my point needs to get  a life.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
